title: Learning Style-Based Physics Module Design and Technology Integration Course

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic physics concepts at the high school level
context.additional_context: Non-degree adult learner program in a smartphone-centric, limited-technology environment, featuring project-based assessments.

learning_goals: Principles for designing physics content tailored to learning styles (visual/auditory, active/reflective) can be explained and applied
One prototype of a customized online module per learning style can be developed using Isman's instructional design model
Learning modules can be implemented using technical tools (quiz apps, video editors, etc.) executable in smartphone environments
Reports analyzing module effectiveness by learning style can be produced through project-based assessments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
